behavior locate_remote_control():
    body:
        # Check if a remote control is present in the known locations
        if exists remote: item : is_remote_control(remote):
            bind remote: item where:
                is_remote_control(remote)
            achieve close_char(char, remote)
        else:
            foreach remote: item:
                if is_remote_control(remote) and not visited(remote):
                    observe(remote, "Looking for the remote control")
                    # Observe to check if it is the remote control needed
                    
behavior __goal__():
    body:
        locate_remote_control()
